Name: Fantastic Pinball Thrills
About the game: Are you ready for the ultimate Pinball challenge? The authentically detailed Pinball tables are inviting you to a round of thrilling arcade action. The modern technology ensures a top-notch, state-of-the-art physics simulation. Marvel at the superb realism, right down to the reflections, on 6 uniquely themed tables with a variety of camera perspectives that deliver the perfect Pinball feeling. Features 6 unique pinball tables: “Fly Away”, “Racing”, “In Space”, “Castle”, “Break the Speed”, “Oktoberfest” Top-notch simulations of ramps, bumpers and switches Fantastic pinball physics Multiple camera angles ensure a totally immersive pinball feeling Authentic atmosphere right down to realistic reflections and sound effects Gamepad Support
